mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderdto (userId, orderDate, postAddress, detailAddress, detailAddress2, recipient, recipientPhone) VALUES (#{userId}, NOW(), #{postAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{detailAddress2}, #{recipient}, #{recipientPhone});

INSERT INTO paymentdto (orderNum, paymentKind, paymentCard, paymentMoney, paymentRegDate) SELECT o.orderNum, #{paymentKind}, #{paymentCard}, #{paymentMoney}, NOW() FROM orderdto as o INNER JOIN memberdto as m ON m.userId = o.userId WHERE m.userid = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT o.orderNum, o.userId, o.orderDate, p.productName, p.productPrice, c.productCnt FROM orderdetaildto as od INNER JOIN orderdto as o ON od.orderNum = o.orderNum INNER JOIN cartdto as c ON o.userId = c.userId JOIN productdto as p ON c.pno = p.pno WHERE o.userId = #{o.userId};

SELECT orderNum, o.userId, orderDate, postAddress, detailAddress, detailAddress2, recipient, recipientPhone, p.productName, p.productPrice, c.productCnt, p.pno FROM orderdto as o INNER JOIN cartdto as c ON o.userId = c.userId JOIN productdto as p ON c.pno = p.pno WHERE o.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY orderNum
select m.userId, postAddress, address, detailAddress, m.userPhoneNumber from memberaddressdto as ma INNER JOIN memberdto as m ON ma.userId = m.userId where m.userId = #{userId};
